game.name: Saint Emiliana
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: After Emiliana's sister is captured in a Witch Hunt, she offers up her soul to a demon in order to gain the power of a Witch. Now she must wrestle with her faith as she searches for her sister.
game.shortDescriptionEn: After Emiliana's sister is captured in a Witch Hunt, she offers up her soul to a demon in order to gain the power of a Witch. Now she must wrestle with her faith as she searches for her sister.

reviewHighlights.text: 스토리, 캐릭, 게임성 뭐 하나 앞서는게 없음
